resources.string: Select a default photo here or click the camera to pick your chocie in your albums
Funny Learning offers school courses in Maths and English. Kids can enjoy these free lessons to the fullest. Help children better adapt to their curriculum in school.
Learning is very boring. In this way, Funny Learning provides 3 games for children to learn while playing. And also, these games can also test the knowledge mastery.
The data of daily learning is provided in the app, and it will be visualized. Help parents better understand their children\'s learning status.
